settings.title: Curve Equality
settings.text: We engineer, design and fit our products for every curve

settings.title: Curve Equality
settings.text: We engineer, design and fit our products for every curve

settings.title: Founded on the principle of “Curve Equality”
settings.text_block: All shapes are different, but created equal, we designed a jean that maximizes a woman’s shape by fusing together style, comfort and technology. Democracy’s signature “Ab”solution jean uses innovative construction that incorporates smooth, super-stretch denim, slimming panels to mold and hold, a hidden inner elastic waistband for a no gap waist, mesh panels for tummy control, signature curved back yoke, and strategically placed pockets which give her a “booty lift.”

settings.testimonial: “I have always struggled to find jeans that fit until I found Democracy”
"Very, very comfortable! Tucks and shapes!!!! Love them!”
